title: Daily Note - 2025-06-28
summary: A highly productive day focused on enhancing the Collapsi RL training system, completing a comprehensive academic paper analysis project, and initiating the Interactive CV project. Key achievements include implementing session timestamps and architecture preservation for RL checkpoints, integrating MCTS with PPO training, and transforming academic paper summaries into detailed technical documents.
accomplishments: Implemented session timestamps for Collapsi RL training checkpoints
Added complete architecture preservation in Collapsi RL checkpoints
Created comprehensive model evaluation system for Collapsi RL
Integrated Monte Carlo Tree Search (MCTS) with PPO training for Collapsi RL
Fixed all type checking and diagnostic issues across Collapsi RL codebase
Rewrote README.md and updated CLAUDE.md documentation for Collapsi RL
Completed comprehensive analysis and enrichment of all academic papers
Transformed basic paper summaries into 300+ line technical documents
Added deep mathematical frameworks and theoretical implications to paper analyses
Connected research to broader literature in optimal transport, control theory, and statistical mechanics
Created publication-quality analyses suitable for graduate reference
Set up initial repository for Interactive CV project with academic profiles and paper analyses
Created comprehensive academic profile with research style and technical mastery sections
Made initial git commit preserving all academic work for Interactive CV
insights: Session timestamps are crucial for preventing checkpoint confusion in long training runs
MCTS integration can add 200-400 Elo strength but at 50x computational cost
Monte Carlo returns work better than GAE for short-horizon games like Collapsi
Systematic paper analysis methodology produces significantly better academic documentation
learning: MCTS implementation patterns for two-player games
Terminal outcome prediction as auxiliary loss improves credit assignment in RL
future_work: Start comparative training runs: Standard PPO vs PPO+MCTS
Set up GitHub repository for interactive CV project
Begin frontend development for interactive CV presentation
